name: MacX YouTube Downloader
short_description:
As the best free YouTube video downloader, MacX YouTube Downloader is specially designed for Mac users to download all YouTube videos in whatever format or resolution, including MP4, WebM, FLV, even YouTube HD videos in 720P, 1080P or 4K Ultra HD. The built-in video player also enables users to watch YouTube videos during the downloading process.

Integrated with open-and-shut interface and advanced technology, MacX YouTube Downloader is an ideal tool for both computer expert or green hands to free download online videos with fast speed and original quality. It is 100% clean and safe, without any adware, malware or spyware bundled.

For more info: http://www.macxdvd.com/free-youtube-video-downloader-mac/
summary: Free download any videos from YouTube flawlessly
